divs: Sighting DetailsI am currently filming an area because I've photographed many strange things ...changing tree line, hovering objects, and flying disks there for a while. I found that my camera was only filming at 10 fps so I changed it to 20 frames per second and went back today and caught this on film. I didn't see it at all with my eyes. Lately though I am starting to see parts of them though. I can see just a glistening of them around tree's. When I photograph them they are only faintly visible. I read some articles on cloaking and that seems to be what they are doing...bending light so that they can be hidden right in front of a tree or other object. I contacted some of the companies working on cloaking technology as well as a professor at Duke University who hasn't written me back to tell them I have photo's of cloaked objects. Anyway the video shows an object at the 49 -50 second frame. I have now lost 17 pounds since I first posted here two months ago, only feel like eating 1 time a day and not that much, can't sleep.
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Pearisburg
There were no other sightings in Pearisburg on or around August 5th 2007
This sighting has never been favorited.
